CHAT.comment: DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE OF KENTUCKY, ET AL., Petitioner v. GEORGE W. DAVIS, ET UX.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT of C. CHRISTOPHER TROWER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF G. ERIC BRUNSTAD, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT of C. CHRISTOPHER TROWER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:06 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
